userStories.description: Create scripts/fetch_metadata.py with wikipedia dependency. Implement basic Wikipedia page search and summary extraction for a test language (e.g., 'C').
Implement logic to find author images, download them to Algorithms/BruteForce/<Lang>/Media/, and remove unreferenced non-logo images.
Format the extracted data into the LanguageMeta JSON structure and generate the content for LanguagesMetadata.ts.
acceptanceCriteria: Generates valid TypeScript code or JSON
